tool_description: Ordering Stack Inventory API - manages inventory for restaurants, handing inventory documents/operations etc...
name: Inventory
title: Inventory

api_list.name: warehouses
api_list.description: Get paginated list of warehouses. This endpoint is compatible with React AdminOnRest framework to provide DataSource.

api_list.name: getDocuments
api_list.description: Get paginated list of documents. This endpoint is compatible with React AdminOnRest framework to provide DataSource.

api_list.name: getWarehouse
getDocument
lowStock
api_list.description: Get low stock (stock with quantities less or equal 3)

api_list.name: getStates
api_list.description: Get paginated list of stock states. This endpoint is compatible with React AdminOnRest framework to provide DataSource.
